FuncDef: This command determines the upper limits for total number of routes to be received and accepted by the system. The total number is inclusive of both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses and no differentiation is needed across protocols. It includes the sum of both. Once this limit is reached, the download process stops sending new access-requests until the next download-interval expires.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of the routes imported. Values-1 to 200000.
